```{r}
parole_adj_adv %>%
  filter(count > 5) %>%
  filter(pos == "Adjective" | pos == "Adverb") %>%
  filter(sentiment == "positive") %>%
  mutate(word = reorder(word, count)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(count, word)) +
  geom_col() +
  labs(y = NULL)
```



```{r count-1}
parole_sub6 <- parole_sub2 %>%
  group_by(pubtitle, pos) %>%
  summarise(count = n())%>%
  arrange(desc(count)) %>%
  na.omit()
```
